body_html:
Thank you for your help and information. I installed 1.5 and it worked. As stated in the issue above, I think from version 1.6 and above, it requires AVX instruction sets. I did not check for them though.

I had also posted the question in stackoverflow, and here's the link to it.

According to the only answer there, am missing VCOMP140.dll, which I could not find even after installing the redistributable.
body_text:
Thank you for your help and information. I installed 1.5 and it worked. As stated in the issue above, I think from version 1.6 and above, it requires AVX instruction sets. I did not check for them though.
I had also posted the question in stackoverflow, and here's the link to it.
According to the only answer there, am missing VCOMP140.dll, which I could not find even after installing the redistributable.
body:
Thank you for your help and information. I installed 1.5 and it worked. As stated in the issue above, I think from version 1.6 and above, it requires AVX instruction sets. I did not check for them though.

I had also posted the question in stackoverflow, and here's the [link](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51605105/tensorflow-1-9-for-cpu-without-gpu-still-requires-cudnn-windows/51606222?noredirect=1#comment90201596_51606222) to it.

According to the only answer there, am missing **VCOMP140.dll**, which I could not find even after installing the redistributable.
